title: Start
body:
Hey there, you look like the adventurous type.
How about helping me out?
I have lost one of my tentacles in this maze.
Can you help me find the way out so I can retrieve it?
How about a small reward for each tentacle you retrieve?
I promise it'll be worth your while.

title: NODE
body:
Woah..! Look who finally made it out of the maze!
And with the tentacle in hand, too.

title: NODE_3
body: Now, let's head over to the next maze..
